bussesInfo.description: A comunica actor for creating Binding-Aggregators.

actors.description: Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [avg](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggAvg)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [count](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggCount)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [group-concat](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggGroupConcat)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [max](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggMax)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [min](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggMin)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [sample](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggSample)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [sum](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggSum)
Constructs a bindings aggregator capable of evaluating [wildcard-count](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#defn_aggCount)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for context-preprocess events.

actors.description: Expands shortcuts in the context to full context keys
Will set default context values for query engines, such as the logger, timestamp, function arguments cache, ..
Defines the write destination only if a single query source has been defined

bussesInfo.description: A bus for dereferencing a path or URL into a (generic) stream.

actors.description: Always fails
Resolves the URL using the [HTTP bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-http)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for dereferencing a path or URL into a stream of quads.

actors.description: For dereferencing a path or URL into a parsed stream of quads

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for expression-evaluator-factory events.

actors.description: Constructs a default expression evaluator

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for function factory events.

actors.description: Constructs an [expression function](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-function-factory/lib/ActorFunctionFactory.ts) capable of evaluating the [Bnode](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#func-bnode) function

Constructs an [expression function](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-function-factory/lib/ActorFunctionFactory.ts) capable of evaluating the [Bound](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#func-bound) function

Constructs an [expression function](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-function-factory/lib/ActorFunctionFactory.ts) capable of evaluating the [Coalesce](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#func-coalesce) function

Constructs an [expression function](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-function-factory/lib/ActorFunctionFactory.ts) capable of evaluating any [Extensions](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#extensionFunctions) function passed by the `extensionFunctionCreator` or `extensionFunctions` [context keys](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/blob/master/packages/context-entries/lib/Keys.ts)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for hash-bindings events.

actors.description: Provides a MurmurHash3-based hash function

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for hashing quads.

actors.description: Provides a MurmurHash3-based hash function

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for 'http' events.

actors.description: Uses [fetch](https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/) to perform HTTP requests

Performs rate limiting, by spacing out future requests based on past request durations, in an attempt to match the number of requests sent per second to the number of responses served per second by the server
Can [redirect HTTP actions through a proxy](https://comunica.dev/docs/query/advanced/proxying/)
Performs simple request retries
Intercepts HTTP requests to recover broken links using the [WayBack Machine](https://web.archive.org/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for 'init' events.

actors.description: Can initialize a query engine

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for optimize-query-operation events.

actors.description: Converts every quad pattern in the query to a union of quad patterns per source
Converts BGPs into joins
Wraps the top-level Construct clause in Distinct if --distinct flag is on
Converts [SPARQL `DESCRIBE`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#describe) operations to construct queries with all triples related to a given subject
Pushes down filter expressions into the query plan as deep as possible
Groups exclusive groups of query operations into sources only if those sources support those grouped operations
Merges joins of BGPs into a single BGP
Clusters entries within a join operation into separate sub-joins based if they are connected by variables
Pushes down expressions in left joins into either the left-hand or right-hand operator if it overlaps with just one of them
Removes operations from the query plan that are guaranteed to produce empty results
Identifies all query sources in the context using the [Query Source Identify bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-query-source-identify)
Places all identified query sources in a skolemization wrapper
Rewrites ADD operators as DELETEINSERT operations
Rewrites COPY operators as DELETEINSERT operations
Rewrites MOVE operators as DELETEINSERT operations

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-operation events.

actors.description: Handles [SPARQL `ASK`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#ask) operations
Handles [SPARQL Basic Graph Patterns](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#BasicGraphPatterns) by rewriting it as a join operator of its patterns
Handles [SPARQL `CONSTRUCT`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#construct) operations
Handles [SPARQL `DISTINCT`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#sparqlDistinct) operations by maintaining a identity-based cache of infinite size
Handles [SPARQL `BIND`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#bind) operations
Handles [SPARQL `FILTER`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#evaluation) operations
Handles [SPARQL `FROM`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#specifyingDataset) operations that interprets FROM and FROM NAMED targets as graph elements in quads
Handles [SPARQL `GROUP BY`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#groupby) operations
Handles SPARQL Join operations by delegating to the [RDF Join bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-join) bus
Handles [SPARQL `OPTIONAL`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#optionals) operations by delegating to the [RDF Join bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-join) bus

Handles [SPARQL `MINUS`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#neg-notexists-minus) operations by delegating to the [RDF Join bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-join) bus
Handles SPARQL nop operations
Handles [SPARQL `ORDER BY`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#sparqlOrderBy) operations
Handles [SPARQL alternative property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL inverse property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL link property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL negated property set property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL one or more property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL sequence property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL zero or more property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL zero or one property paths](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#propertypaths) operations
Handles [SPARQL project](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#select) operations
Handles [SPARQL `REDUCED`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#sparqlReduced) operations by maintaining a hash-based cache of a fixed size
Handles SPARQL [`OFFSET`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#modOffset) and [`LIMIT`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#modResultLimit) operations
Delegates operations annotated with a query source towards that source
Handles [SPARQL `UNION`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#alternatives) operations
Handles [SPARQL clear](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#clear) operations
Handles a composition of multiple [SPARQL UPDATE operations](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/)
Handles [SPARQL create](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#create) operations

Handles SPARQL [`INSERT DATA`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#insertData), [`DELETE DATA`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#deleteData), and [`DELETE/INSERT`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#deleteInsert) operations
Handles [SPARQL drop](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#drop) operations
Handles [SPARQL load](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-update/#load) operations
Handles [SPARQL `VALUES`](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/#inline-data) operations

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-parse events.

actors.description: Handles [GraphQL-LD queries](https://github.com/rubensworks/graphql-ld.js)
Handles [SPARQL queries](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-process events.

actors.description: Explains the logical query plan after parsing and optimizing
Explains the parsed query
Explains the physical query plan after parsing, optimizing, and evaluating
Explains the logical query plan as a query string after parsing and optimizing
Processes a query in a sequential manner

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-result-serialize events.

actors.description: Serializes to a simple custom JSON format
Serializes to RDF by delegating to the [RDF Serialize bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-serialize)
Serializes to a simple text-based format
Serializes to [SPARQL/CSV](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-results-csv-tsv/)
Serializes to [SPARQL/JSON](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-results-json/)
Serializes to [SPARQL/TSV](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-results-csv-tsv/)
Serializes to [SPARQL/XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-sparql-XMLres/)
Outputs the number of query results together with their cumulative delay and number of HTTP requests
Serializes to a simple table
Serializes to a JSON tree

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-serialize events.

actors.description: Handles [SPARQL queries](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-source-dereference-link events.

actors.description: Avoids metadata fetching of forced SPARQL endpoints
Resolves links as [hypermedia-based sources](https://comunica.dev/docs/modify/advanced/hypermedia/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-source-identify events.

actors.description: Handles [hypermedia-based sources](https://comunica.dev/docs/modify/advanced/hypermedia/)
Handles [RDF/JS Sources](https://comunica.dev/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs_querying/)
Handles serialized sources

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for query-source-identify-hypermedia events.

actors.description: Handles raw RDF files

Handles [Triple Pattern Fragments](https://linkeddatafragments.org/specification/triple-pattern-fragments/), [Quad Pattern Fragments](https://linkeddatafragments.org/specification/quad-pattern-fragments/), and [bindings-restricted Triple Pattern Fragments](https://arxiv.org/abs/1608.08148) interfaces
Handles [SPARQL endpoints](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-protocol/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-join-entries-sort events.

actors.description: Orders join entries by increasing cardinality
Orders join entries by increasing selectivity values, so that the join entries that would become most selective come first

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-join events.

actors.description: Inner-joins using hashing

Inner-joins 2 or more streams by picking the one with the lowest cardinality, binding each item with the remaining operations, and recursively resolving those operations by delegating to the [Query Operation bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-query-operation)

Inner-joins 2 or more streams by picking the one with the lowest cardinality, chunking it according to a certain block size, and joining each chunk with the remaining query by pushing it into the source
Accepts any number of inner-join entries of which at least one is empty and returns an empty stream

Inner-joins 3 or more streams by joining the smallest two, and joining the result with the remaining streams by delegating back to the [RDF Join bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-join)

Inner-joins 2 or more streams by joining the smallest two, and joining the result with the remaining streams by delegating back to the [RDF Join bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-join)
Inner-joins using nested looping
Handles an inner-join between zero entries, and returns a single binding
Handles inner-joining of a single entry, and returns the entry itself
Inner-joins using symmetric hashing
Anti-joins (minus) 2 streams using the hash join algorithm
Left-joins (optional) 2 streams using the bind join algorithm
Uses hash joins and can handle optional patterns
Left-joins (optional) 2 streams using the nested loop join algorithm

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-join-selectivity events.

actors.description: Heuristically tries to estimate the selectivity of joins by counting the overlap of variables and non-variables in patterns

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-metadata-accumulate events.

actors.description: Handles the `cardinality` field
Handles the `pageSize` field
Handles the `requestTime` field

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-metadata events.

actors.description: Sees everything as both data and metadata
Splits off the metadata based on the existence of a `foaf:primaryTopic` link

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-metadata-extract events.

actors.description: Extracts the `Allow` HTTP response header
Extract controls and links in the [Hydra Core vocabulary](https://www.hydra-cg.com/spec/latest/core/)
Extract estimated counts in the [Hydra Core vocabulary](https://www.hydra-cg.com/spec/latest/core/) and [VoID](https://www.w3.org/TR/void/)
Extract page sizes in the [Hydra Core vocabulary](https://www.hydra-cg.com/spec/latest/core/)
That check for the value `application/sparql-update` in the `Accept-Patch` header
That extract the [`Accept-Post` header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Reference/Headers/Accept-Post)
Extracts the [`Accept-Put`](https://solidproject.org/TR/protocol#accept-put) HTTP response header
Extract the time it took to request the page in milliseconds
Extracts [SPARQL Service Description metadata](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-service-description/)
Extracts [VoID dataset description metadata](https://www.w3.org/TR/void/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for 'init' events.

actors.description: Handles RDF in HTML, by delegating to the [RDF Parse HTML bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-parse-html)
Handles [JSON-LD](https://json-ld.org/)
Handles Turtle, TriG, N-Quads, N-Triples and N3 using [N3.js](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n3)
Handles [RDF/XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-syntax-grammar/)
Handles [SHACL Compact Syntax](https://w3c.github.io/shacl/shacl-compact-syntax/) and [Extended SHACL Compact Syntax](https://github.com/jeswr/shaclcjs#extended-shacl-compact-syntax) RDF Parse Actor
Handles [RDFa in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/2008/REC-SVGTiny12-20081222/metadata.html#MetadataAttributes)

actors.description: Handles [Microdata to RDF conversion](https://w3c.github.io/microdata-rdf/)
Handles [RDFa in HTML](https://www.w3.org/TR/rdfa-in-html/)
Handles [script tags in HTML](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/) by delegating to the [RDF Parse bus](https://github.com/comunica/comunica/tree/master/packages/bus-rdf-parse)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-resolve-hypermedia-links events.

actors.description: Emits the `next` field from extracted metadata as link to be followed

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-resolve-hypermedia-links-queue events.

actors.description: Provides a [`ILinkQueue`](https://comunica.github.io/comunica/interfaces/_comunica_bus_rdf_resolve_hypermedia_links_queue.ILinkQueue.html) following the first in, first out strategy

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-serialize events.

actors.description: Handles JSON-LD
Handles Turtle, TriG, N-Quads, N-Triples and N3 using [N3.js](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n3)
Handles [SHACL Compact Syntax](https://w3c.github.io/shacl/shacl-compact-syntax/) and [Extended SHACL Compact Syntax](https://github.com/jeswr/shaclcjs#extended-shacl-compact-syntax)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for rdf-update-hypermedia events.

actors.description: Handles destinations over HTTP using SPARQL Update queries

Handles RDF Update Hypermedia

actors.description: Handles [hypermedia-based destinations](https://comunica.dev/docs/modify/advanced/hypermedia/)
Handles [RDF/JS Stores](https://comunica.dev/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs_querying/)

bussesInfo.description: A comunica bus for term-comparator-factory events.

actors.description: Uses the evaluation of the inequality functions `<` and `=` of the expression evaluator
